description: MediaMosa is a full-fledged Digital Asset Management and Delivery System built with Drupal. As the technology behind the Acquia Media Drive, NBC Sports websites, lecturing systems at universities across Europe, and numerous document management systems, its role as an Open Source alternative to closed Digital Asset Management systems is continually increasing.
